title: Lido Finance Discloses 20 Slashing Events Due To Validator Issues
description: Lido revealed the initial impact was around 20 ETH, worth $31,000. The validator involved has been taken offline.

title: BlackRock takes legal action against 44 deceptive domains
description: BlackRock, a predominant investment authority, has decisively stepped into legal arenas, pursuing stringent actions against alleged online miscreants and a slew of deceptive internet domains. description: Artificial intelligence (AI) has taken the world by storm, revolutionizing industries and enhancing the way we live and work. title: Platypus Finance suffers its third hack in 2023, losses $2m
description: The Platypus team said on social media it had taken the ‘proactive measure’ to suspend all pools temporarily. Decentralized finance (defi) protocol Platypus Finance suffered yet another hack this year, as around $2 million was stolen from the project. According…

title: JPMorgan predicts 20% drop in Bitcoin hash rate after halving
description: JPMorgan has published a report predicting a possible 20% reduction in the Bitcoin hash rate after the halving event scheduled for April 2024. The report suggests that up to 80 EH/s, which equates to 20% of the current network hash…

title: Venezuelan oppositioner highlights crypto’s role amid crisis
description: A Venezuelan oppositioner Leopoldo Lopez praised crypto as a tool to overcome censorship but also addressed its dependency on corrupted banks. As Venezuela struggles with a humanitarian crisis, crypto has become a vital tool for many Venezuelans seeking to preserve…

title: Cardano Founder Dispels ETHGate Corruption Claims: No Proof of SEC Bribery
description: Cardano founder, Charles Hoskinson has waded into the recent ETHGate controversy. He believes there is no evidence of bribery by the ETH founding team. title: Whale Activity for REQ, TUSD, OCEAN, and DYDX Surges: Report
